markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fortified Flesh](/Feats.aspx?ID=891) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Living Monolith](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=16)

**Prerequisites**
[Ka Stone Ritual](/Feats.aspx?ID=889)

</column>

---

Your flesh takes on the hardness of stone. You gain resistance to physical damage (except adamantine) equal to your number of class feats from the Living Monolith archetype.
name: Fortified Flesh
